attributes.action: Equality for parents of the fallen in uk
attributes.additional_details: I/WE Ask the MOD to include both parents in all letters wrote by MOD GOVERNMENT AND ALL OFFICIAL BODIES IN THE SITUATION OF FAMILIES OF UK fallen, so those not next of kin get letters of condolence and their own invites to be included in all public announcements ,news papers, web sites ....not just the Next of KIN  to bring about Equality fairness to both parents so the parent/parents  not next of kin are Fully included recognized in all aspects of their loss grieve it should be made standard practice .
